markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Grave Strength](/Feats.aspx?ID=3508) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 49</row>

**Archetype** [Ghoul](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=178)

**Prerequisites**
[Ghoul Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3504)

</column>

---

The flesh you've consumed over the course of your existence as a ghoul has made you stronger, gifting you with strange insights from the minds of the sapient creatures you've devoured and bringing you closer to a state of undead perfection. You gain the [advanced undead benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=1695). In addition, you gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed while you're satiated.
name: Grave Strength
